CustomField.description: Global codes that are used to identify different types of sales. These codes consist of sales category codes concatenated with a single number to indicate different types of sales within that category. Examples: A0 = Normal Retail F1 = Driving School E0 = Employee G1 = Sale to a Federal Government Agency or component D2 = Lease to a company/firm by a dealer O1 = Other
CustomField.label: Global Sales Type Code
